Name: Assassin's Creed Freedom Cry
About the game: Born a slave, Adewale found freedom as a pirate aboard Edward Kenway’s ship, the Jackdaw. 15 years later, Adewale has become a trained Assassin who finds himself shipwrecked in Saint-Domingue without weapons or crew. He now has to acquire a ship and gather his own crew to free the slaves and avenge them. Over 3 hours of new single-player gameplay! Playing Assassin’s Creed® Freedom Cry doesn't require a copy of Assassin’s Creed®IV Black Flag™.
